name: KANGO
description: Kango is handmade pixel art-based meme coin on KRC20. we are maintaining the genuine touch by producing original art/animations. We were fair launched, and quickly joined the ranks of top 2 KRC-20 tokens in terms of volumes. We have 1400 holders. 3.5k followers. We are listed on both XTExchange and CoinEx. KANGO has a strong team leading it and a good community backing In 5 days, KANGO hit the second spot of the most traded meme on krc20
